今年度更會首次於點播重溫時提供中英文字幕*，讓更多海外人士能積極參與今次盛事。

21個指定地區包括：台灣，日本，韓國，泰國，英國，法國，德國，俄羅斯，荷蘭，比利時，盧森堡，阿根廷，玻利維亞，巴西，智利，哥倫比亞，厄瓜多爾，巴拉圭，秘魯，烏拉圭和委內瑞拉。

*請密切留意中英文字幕稍後之發佈時間

TFI is authorized by the Hong Kong Film Awards as the Official Worldwide Online Live Streaming and Video-On-Demand (VOD) partner, using HERMES Live Streaming technology and the enterprise-class hardware support by Hewlett Packard Enterprise to provide live streaming and VOD to over 20 territories for FREE on web and mobile devices.

This year, English and Chinese subtitles* will be firstly provided on VOD, allowing more oversea audiences to participate in this remarkable event.

21 designated territories include: Taiwan, Japan, Korea, Thailand, United Kingdom, France, Germany, Russia, Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg, Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Paraguay, Peru, Uruguay and Venezuela.
